title: Pioneers of Energy Medicine Continues: Shiva, Lord of Destruction
text:

Shiva is one of the three main gods of the Hindu pantheon. In Hinduism Brahma represents the principle of creation, Vishnu represents the principle of preservation and Shiva represents the principle of destruction.

The QuWave Divine sends out frequencies that increase the rate at which spiritual and paranormal experiences occur. Uses for the Divine include enhancing prayer, meditation, and other spiritual pursuits. One use specifically for Halloween includes using the Divine with a Ouija board to communicate with spirits.
